description: Detects Registry modifications performed by Ke3chang malware in campaigns running in 2019 and 2020
false_positives: Will need to be looked for combinations of those processes
name: Ke3chang Registry Key Modifications
query: process.command_line:(*\-Property\ DWORD\ \-name\ DisableFirstRunCustomize\ \-value\ 2\ \-Force* OR *\-Property\ String\ \-name\ Check_Associations\ \-value* OR *\-Property\ DWORD\ \-name\ IEHarden\ \-value\ 0\ \-Force*)
author: Markus Neis
Swisscom
